result.name: Kiwi

result.css:
/* Header Colors */
$search-text-color: #ffffff
$navpage-header-bg: #192628
$navpage-header-color: #ffffff
$navpage-header-button-color: #ffffff
$navpage-header-divider-color: #293e40

/* Left nav and navigation toolbar background color */
$nav-highlight-main: #192628
$subnav-background-color: #111a1c
$navpage-nav-bg: #192628
$navpage-nav-bg-sub: #192628
$navpage-nav-color-sub: #ffffff
$navpage-nav-mod-text-hover: #ffffff
$nav-hr-color: #192628

/* Navigator tabs */
$nav-highlight-bar-active: #b8e0d7
$nav-highlight-bar-inactive: #d1d6d8
$navpage-nav-selected-bg: #2f4f4e
$navpage-nav-selected-color: #b8e0d7
$navpage-nav-unselected-color: #d1d6d8

/* Color of outline for search */
$connect-latest-message: #b8e0d7
$nav-timeago-header-color: #192628
$navpage-nav-app-pill-icon-text: #192628
$navpage-nav-app-text: #ffffff
$navpage-nav-app-text-hover: #ffffff

$navpage-nav-border: #cbcbcb
$navpage-button-color: #ffffff
$navpage-button-color-hover: #b8e0d7

$input-border: #8b8b8b

$color-darkest: #151515
$color-darker: #2e2e2e
$color-dark: #4a4a4a
$color-light: #cbcbcb
$color-lighter: #e6e9eb
$color-lightest: #ffffff

$color-positive: #326f57
$color-warning: #6b611f
$color-negative: #c83c36
$color-info: #315d67

$color-accent: #165c53
$color-accent-light: #54ac98
$color-accent-lighter: #82c9b8

$color-primary-text: #ffffff;
$color-info-text: #ffffff
$color-negative-text: #ffffff
$color-positive-text: #ffffff
$color-warning-text: #ffffff

$btn-info-text-hover: #fffff
$btn-negative-text-hover: #fffff
$btn-positive-text-hover: #fffff
$btn-warning-text-hover: #fffff

result.css:
$color-darkest: #303A46
			$color-darker: #455464
			$color-dark: #828890
			$color-light: #bec1c6
			$color-lighter: #cfd4d8
			$color-lightest: #e7e9eb
			
			$accent-color: #278efc
			$accent-color-dark: ${$accent-color}
			$accent-color-light: #bddcfc
			$color-accent: ${$accent-color-dark}
			$color-accent-light: ${$accent-color-light}
			
			$text-color: #000000
